title: Petitioner Decides to Withdraw Varanasi Gyanvapi Mosque-Shringar Gauri Temple Case - News18
content:

description: The Gyanvapi Masjid and Shringar Gauri Mandir case has taken a new turn as Vishwa Vedic Sanatan Sangh announced on Sunday that it will withdraw the petition filed in the court for regular Darshan of the temple located in the famous mosque complex of Varanasi.
